name: Black Out (Bow) [V.1.2]
description:
CLICK THE GREEN FLAG 2X BEFORE PLAYING

                         Controls (scroll down): 

WASD // Arrow Keys    =   Movement Controls

"F" = Dash (only goes backwards)

MouseButton1 // Space = Shoot

"R" = Refill your arrows

"E" = Triple Arrow (shoots three arrows in a spread)

"Q" = Flame Arrow (more precise and has pierce)

    

                                    Objective: 

Defend yourself from as many Robots as possible, and stop them without dieing!
